name: sledgehammer
content:

a large, heavy hammer with a long handle, used for breaking stones or other heavy material, or for hitting posts into the ground, etc.
Jupiterimages/liquidlibrary/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
used to describe a way of behaving that is too forceful: They accused the prime minister of using sledgehammer tactics.
